participant_2.background:
My hair is curly and dark.
I have two children.
I do not like to clean house.
I sell clothing on facebook.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well. How are you?

I'm doing good. I'm an artist, and I'm a mom with two sons and a husband. I live in a house with a yard. I love to create with my mind and my hands. My parents taught me to find inspiration in the world.
That's great! I'm a stay-at-home mom with two children, and I sell clothing on Facebook. I have curly and dark hair. I don't like to clean house.
That's interesting! I'm sorry to hear that you don't like to clean house. I love to clean house. I think it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I'm glad you like it! I just don't have the time or energy to do it all the time.
I understand. It can be tough to find the time to do everything.
Yeah, it can be. But I'm trying to get better at it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We go on walks, play games, and watch movies. I also like to read, bake, and paint.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family and friends too. We go on walks, play games, and watch movies. I also like to read, paint, and garden.
That's great! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans later.
